issue.title: Flow TS Table method generics
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1590](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1590). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Table method generics should thread the Vector and value types through from the call site.
